thread.title: Look into the eyes of Alabama: Portrait photographers to follow on Instagram
thread.title_full: Look into the eyes of Alabama: Portrait photographers to follow on Instagram

author: Sara Frye | sfrye@al.com
title: Look into the eyes of Alabama: Portrait photographers to follow on Instagram
text:
Based in: Mobile, AL 
Day job: Student at University of Mobile 
Describe your account to new followers: "I shoot a wide variety of styles of photography, and I like to think that my Instagram is an eclectic collection, taking on different forms. You'll mostly find images of abstract subjects, often seen in everyday life, with a unique angle or twist. I also shoot professional portraits that have a similar unique, abstract twist to the approach. I take pictures of anything that catches my eye in a special way and that I think has the same effect on my audience." 
Advice for people who want to have a successful Instagram: "My best advice I can give in regards to a successful Instagram account is consistency. The first step is to decide what you want your account to look like, which can be done through exploring the Instagram community. The second and most important step is to stay consistent with whatever that style is, whether it be of natural light in the kitchen, or fun pictures of your dog. Go for a consistent look to every picture you take. You can immediately distinguish Instagram users who do and don't use this rule of thumb." 
---
